But, in most cases, our friends are happy to listen and offer support. Not That Weird is all about making mental health conversations natural and normal so that we all feel comfortable speaking about our experiences or reaching out to friends. Bring Change to Mind can help you start the conversation. Learn more at bringchangetomind.org.Recipes you want to make. Cooking advice that works.
